summary: Pietro Breccia is a man who has long decided to abandon civilization becoming a hermit, leaving behind the strain of modern life and the futility of consumer society and living for years in... See full summary »
cast: Vittorio Gassman|Ann-Margret|Giuseppe Altamurra|Egidio Casolari|Bruna Cealti|Geoffrey Copleston|Dino Curcio|Fiorenzo Fiorentini|Franco Gulà|Giuseppe Lauricella|Oreste Lionello|Maria Grazia Marescalchi|Renato Marzano|Tiziano Montagni|Liana Orfei|Evi Rigano|Enzo Robutti|Yvonne Sanson|Anita Saxe|Giovanni Ivan Scratuglia|Harry Stuart|Carmen Villani|Gianni Dei|Julie Fair|Ettore Geri|Giuseppe Marrocco|Oscar Sciamanna|Maria Tedeschi
title: El profeta
